pricing.marketingDescription1: Streamline operations with our intuitive platform, designed for field teams.
pricing.marketingDescription2: Join teams worldwide who trust WorkHoursTracker for efficiency.
pricing.heroSubtitle: Transparent, scalable costs. Only pay for what you need, with no hidden fees.
pricing.proratingExplanation: Additional workers added mid-cycle are prorated, so you only pay for what you use.
pricing.feature3: Workers see daily assignments on mobile app
pricing.feature6: Live worker location map for managers
pricing.faq1Q: What happens if I add more workers?
pricing.faq1A: Extra seats are prorated. You only pay for the remaining days of the billing cycle.
pricing.faq2A: Yes, each worker needs an account to access assignments and track hours.
pricing.faq3A: Workers check in via the mobile app, with their GPS location validated against assigned job sites.
pricing.faq4A: Workers manually check-in/out for tasks, and managers have overview dashboards.
pricing.faq5A: No, there isn't. You can cancel your subscription anytime without penalties.
pricing.faq6A: Not yet, but this feature is planned for future updates.
